sourcesContent:
import { Fragment } from 'react' import { Popover, Transition } from '@headlessui/react' import { XMarkIcon, } from '@heroicons/react/24/outline' import { Squares2X2Icon, HomeModernIcon, AcademicCapIcon, FolderIcon } from '@heroicons/react/20/solid' const solutions = [ { name: 'Home', href: '/', icon: HomeModernIcon, }, { name: 'Education', href: '/learning', icon: AcademicCapIcon, }, { name: 'Documentation', href: '/documentation', icon: FolderIcon, }, ] function classNames(...classes) { return classes.filter(Boolean).join(' ') } export default function Example() { return (
Open menu

{solutions.map((item) => (

{item.name}

 ))}
)}
Close menu
{solutions.map((item) => ( {item.name} ))}
) }
